definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Chinese tour operators are notorious for bargaining down travel and hotel costs.
sentences.chinese: 中国旅行团因为在旅行和宾馆花费上砍价而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: Are you sure about the name of that hotel?
sentences.chinese: 关于那个宾馆的名字，你确定吗？

sentences.english: Staying in Dong Fang is the best choice for your tour and business.
sentences.chinese: 下榻东方宾馆，是您商旅的最佳选择。

sentences.english: Yunfu Conifer Guest Hotel welcome you to visit.
sentences.chinese: 云浮康年迎宾馆欢迎你的光临。

sentences.english: To be frank, big restaurants and big hotels are the main places producing drainage oil.
sentences.chinese: 说白了，大酒楼大宾馆是地沟油的主要产地。

sentences.english: The high-quality service of this hotel has won a high reputation Both at home and aBroad.
sentences.chinese: 该宾馆的优质服务，在国内外享有很高声誉。

sentences.english: Holiday economics brought a lot of profits to hotels and tourism.
sentences.chinese: 假日经济给宾馆和旅游业带来了很大利润。

sentences.english: Here is the hotel service information  booklet.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们宾馆的服务信息册。

sentences.english: One day, Xiao Zhang, a taxi driver, sent an American couple to a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 一天，出租车司机小张开车送一对美国夫妇去宾馆。

sentences.english: The Dong Fang Hotel during the trade fair housed a motley collection of people from every corner of the globe.
sentences.chinese: 广交会期间东方宾馆的客人来自全球各地，肤色各异。

sentences.english: There is also a supply of foreign Western Hotels, and some will have Tibetan song and dance performances.
sentences.chinese: 涉外宾馆里还供应西餐，有的还会有藏族歌舞表演。

sentences.english: I asked the bus driver to put me off near the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我请公共汽车司机在宾馆附近让我下车。

sentences.english: She want look for one-house advantageous-suitable-of guest-house.
sentences.chinese: 我们要找一家干净的宾馆。

sentences.english: Eat breakfast at your hotel if it is offered.
sentences.chinese: 如果宾馆会提供早餐的话，就在那吃吧。

sentences.english: Hotel rooms were invariably furnished with free packs of cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 宾馆房间始终提供免费的成包的香烟。

definition: karaoke hall/singing hall (venue for concerts of popular songs)
